label.description: Enter the text to the left of the box

name.description: Name, which serves as an identifier when submitting the form
name.description_zh: 名称，作为提交表单时的标识符

id.description: Enter the box id, and set the for attribute of the label
id.description_zh: 输入框 id，同时会设置 label 的 for 属性

type.description: The input box type supports all the [type attributes] (https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#%3Cinput%3E_types) of the native input tag, and additionally supports the 'digit' type
type.description_zh: 输入框类型, 支持原生 input 标签的所有 [type 属性](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#%3Cinput%3E_types)，额外支持了 `digit` 类型

maxlength.description: The maximum number of characters entered

border.description: Whether to display the inner border

disabled.description: Whether to disable the input field

readonly.description: Whether it is in the read-only state, and the content cannot be entered in the read-only state
readonly.description_zh: 是否为只读状态，只读状态下无法输入内容

colon.description: Whether to add a colon after the label
colon.description_zh: 是否在 label 后面添加冒号

required.description: Whether or not to display a form required asterisk
required.description_zh: 是否显示表单必填星号

center.description: Whether to center the content vertically

clearable.description: Whether to enable the clear icon, clicking the clear icon will clear the input box
clearable.description_zh: 是否启用清除图标，点击清除图标后会清空输入框

clear-icon.description: Clear the icon name or image link, which is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
clear-icon.description_zh: 清除图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

clear-trigger.description: When the clear icon is displayed, 'always' means that the input box is not displayed when it is empty, and 'focus' means that the input box is focused and not displayed when it is empty
clear-trigger.description_zh: 显示清除图标的时机，`always` 表示输入框不为空时展示， `focus` 表示输入框聚焦且不为空时展示

clickable.description: Whether to turn on click feedback

is-link.description: Whether to show the right-hand arrow and turn on click feedback
is-link.description_zh: 是否展示右侧箭头并开启点击反馈

autofocus.description: Whether or not autofocus is not supported by the iOS system
autofocus.description_zh: 是否自动聚焦，iOS 系统不支持该属性

show-word-limit.description: Whether to display the word count or not, you need to set the 'maxlength' attribute
show-word-limit.description_zh: 是否显示字数统计，需要设置 `maxlength` 属性

error.description: Whether or not to mark the input in red

error-message.description: The error message at the bottom is not displayed when it is empty
error-message.description_zh: 底部错误提示文案，为空时不展示

error-message-align.description: Error message text alignment, optional value 'center' right
error-message-align.description_zh: 错误提示文案对齐方式，可选值为 `center` right

format-trigger.description: When the formatting function fires, the optional value is onBlur
format-trigger.description_zh: 格式化函数触发的时机，可选值为 onBlur

arrow-direction.description_zh: 箭头方向，可选值为 `left` `up` down

label-class.description: The left text has an additional class name

label-width.description: The width of the text on the left, the default unit is px
label-width.description_zh: 左侧文本宽度，默认单位为 px

label-align.description: Left text alignment, optional values are 'center' 'right' top
label-align.description_zh: 左侧文本对齐方式，可选值为 `center` `right` top

input-align.description: Enter the box alignment, optionally 'center' right
input-align.description_zh: 输入框对齐方式，可选值为 `center` right

autosize.description: Whether the content height is adaptive or not, only valid for textarea, can be passed in objects, such as { maxHeight: 100, minHeight: 50 }, in px
autosize.description_zh: 是否自适应内容高度，只对 textarea 有效， 可传入对象,如 { maxHeight: 100, minHeight: 50 }， 单位为px

left-icon.description: The icon name or image link on the left is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
left-icon.description_zh: 左侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

right-icon.description: The icon name or image link on the right is equivalent to the [name attribute] of the Icon component(https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props)
right-icon.description_zh: 右侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

icon-prefix.description: Icon class name prefix, equivalent to the [class-prefix property](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component
icon-prefix.description_zh: 图标类名前缀，等同于 Icon 组件的 [class-prefix 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

rules.description: For details about the form validation rules, see [Form Component](#/en-CN/form#rule-shu-ju-jie-gou)
rules.description_zh: 表单校验规则，详见 [Form 组件](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/form#rule-shu-ju-jie-gou)

autocomplete.description: HTML native attributes, which are used to control the autocomplete function, see [MDN - autocomplete](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete)
autocomplete.description_zh: HTML 原生属性，用于控制自动完成功能，详见 [MDN - autocomplete](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete)

autocapitalize.description: HTML native property, which controls whether text is automatically capitalized when entered, this API is not supported in some browsers, see [MDN - autocapitalize](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/autocapitalize)
autocapitalize.description_zh: HTML 原生属性，用于控制文本输入时是否自动大写，此 API 仅在部分浏览器支持，详见 [MDN - autocapitalize](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/autocapitalize)

enterkeyhint.description: HTML native attribute to control the style of the carriage return key, this API is not supported in some browsers, see [MDN - enterkeyhint](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/enterkeyhint)
enterkeyhint.description_zh: HTML 原生属性，用于控制回车键样式，此 API 仅在部分浏览器支持，详见 [MDN - enterkeyhint](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/enterkeyhint)

spellcheck.description: HTML native attribute to check for misspellings of elements, this API is only supported in some browsers, see [MDN - spellcheck](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/spellcheck)
spellcheck.description_zh: HTML 原生属性，用于检查元素的拼写错误，此 API 仅在部分浏览器支持，详见 [MDN - spellcheck](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/spellcheck)

autocorrect.description: Safari only for autocorrect entered text, see [MDN - autocorrect](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#autocorrect)
autocorrect.description_zh: 仅 Safari 适用，用于自动更正输入的文本，详见 [MDN - autocorrect](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#autocorrect)

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Triggered when the content of the input box changes
events.description_zh: 输入框内容变化时触发

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggers when the input box gains focus
events.description_zh: 输入框获得焦点时触发

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
events.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

events.name: clear
events.description: Triggered when the Clear button is clicked

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a component is clicked

events.name: click-input
events.description: Triggered when you click on the input area

events.name: click-left-icon
events.description: Triggered when you click on the icon on the left

events.name: click-right-icon
events.description: Triggered when you click on the icon on the right

events.name: start-validate
events.description: Triggered when the form validation is started

events.name: end-validate
events.description: Triggered when the form validation is ended

slots.name: label
slots.description: Customize the text on the left side of the input box
slots.description_zh: 自定义输入框左侧文本

slots.name: input
slots.description: Custom input fields, when this slot is used, the properties and events associated with the input fields will be invalidated
slots.description_zh: 自定义输入框，使用此插槽后，与输入框相关的属性和事件将失效

slots.name: left-icon
slots.description: Customize the input box header icon
slots.description_zh: 自定义输入框头部图标

slots.name: right-icon
slots.description: Customize the icon at the end of the input box
slots.description_zh: 自定义输入框尾部图标

slots.name: button
slots.description: Customize the button at the end of the input box
slots.description_zh: 自定义输入框尾部按钮

slots.name: error-message
slots.description: Customize the error prompt copy at the bottom
slots.description_zh: 自定义底部错误提示文案

slots.name: extra
slots.description: Customize the extra content on the far right of the input box
slots.description_zh: 自定义输入框最右侧的额外内容
